source: TEXT_HEAVNZ505_01840_SEQ_00<tab>Mogmill looks like he's daydreaming─or not, it's hard to tell.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ505_01840_SEQ_00<tab>モグモグホーム付近のモグミルは、楽しそうに何かを見ている。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ505_01840_SEQ_01<tab>Mogmill, always thinking about where to get his paws on the next piece of landlord treasure, has recruited you to go to the House of Letters and look for shiny objects. He assures you that all the other moogles go to Tharl Oom Khash, so there should be plenty lying around. Go to the House of Letters and collect five shiny objects of dubious value.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ505_01840_SEQ_01<tab>モグミルの話を聞いた。モーグリ族の間では、人が作った金属が流行っているようだ。ドラヴァニア雲海の手紙の家で「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9AD501 /var>」から「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AEC01 /var>」を5個入手しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ505_01840_SEQ_02<tab>You have obtained five shiny spillikins, and although they are shiny, you fail to see any practical value. Return to Moghome and deliver them to Mogmill─maybe he will put them to better use.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ505_01840_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AEC01 /var>を入手した。モグモグホーム付近の「モグミル」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AEC01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ505_01840_SEQ_03<tab>Mogmill is thrilled at the objects you deliver to him, and is one step closer to having the largest collection of shiny, useless objects out of any moogle from Moghome.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ505_01840_SEQ_03<tab>モグミルに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AEC01 /var>を渡した。<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AEC01 /var>を受け取ったモグミルは、かっこいいと称賛しながら喜んでいた。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ505_01840_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the sparkly spillikins to Mogmill.

TEXT_HEAVNZ505_01840_MOGMILL_000_000<tab>The shiny sundries made by the landlords are in vogue all across Moghome, kupo! But, moogles can't work metal themselves, so everyone goes searching for shiny objects at Tharl Oom Khash.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ505_01840_MOGMILL_000_000<tab>モグたちの間では、ヒトが作った金属が大流行くぽ！
でも、モグたちには、ピカピカは作れないくぽ……。
だから、みんなはサルウーム・カシュに拾いに行くくぽ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ505_01840_MOGMILL_000_001<tab>But <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> know a secret place─the House of Letters, kupo! So many shiny objects are just waiting for someone adventurous to go pick them up. And they <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> call you an adventurer, so... What do you say? If I had five sparkling objects, that should be enough to make the other moogles jealous!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ505_01840_MOGMILL_000_001<tab>ナイショだけど、実は「手紙の家」に落ちてる<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9AD501 /var>に、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AEC01 /var>」が入ってるくぽ！
モグミルのために、5個ほど拾ってきてほしいくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ505_01840_MOGMILL_000_010<tab>Don't tell anyone, but treasures litter the House of Letters. All I need you to do is bring me five of them and it'll make all the other moogles jealous!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ505_01840_MOGMILL_000_010<tab>ナイショだけど、実は「手紙の家」に落ちてる<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9AD501 /var>に、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AEC01 /var>」が入ってるくぽ！
モグミルのために、5個ほど拾ってきてほしいくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ505_01840_MOGMILL_000_020<tab>I can't believe no one has thought to go look there yet... Ah, adventurer, were you able to find enough of the landlords' shiny objects?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ505_01840_MOGMILL_000_020<tab>ナイショだけど、実は「手紙の家」に落ちてる<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9AD501 /var>に、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AEC01 /var>」が入ってるくぽ！
モグミルのために、5個ほど拾ってきてほしいくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ505_01840_MOGMILL_000_021<tab>Wonderful! Amazing! Spectacular, kupopo! I've never seen such lustrous objects before! I'll be the talk of Moghome before long. Remember, adventurer, the House of Letters is our little secret!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ505_01840_MOGMILL_000_021<tab>すごいくぽ！　かっこいいくぽ！　ありがとうくぽ！
みんなも羨ましがるに違いないくぽ！
ふふふ、あの場所は、ふたりのナイショくぽ！
